relation: community college is the way to go!
there are no restaurants on campus or stands. There is the cafeteria, vending machines and coffee stands
explore all opportunities and clubs, some give early registration.

Los Medanos College is a really nice sized school that has students in mind whether it is educational opportunities or financial opportunities. This college has several different career paths that suit different interests. The only complaint I have is the availability of classes, the population is so big the availability can not suit everyone.
pageTitle: Los Medanos College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {37813=Circle K is an amazing club to join. They are there to help their community from Pittsburg to Brentwood alone. They are a very welcoming group that is willing to help in any way they can. They got club of the year for 2012., 226528=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 11319=The first semester cost me around $500 + $1000 for books/supplies. 1 unit costs $26., 57514=I have been attending LMC full time since Summer 2009 and feel as though the classes and faculty prepare you for transfer to a state college or university of your choice. If you did not have the money to jump straight into a UC or CSU right after High School, a junior college like LMC is great at assisting students with programs that will help you pay for books, supplies, rent and transportation if you meet the criteria.}

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Campus Safety I think it's a pretty safe neighborhood, there are campus patrollers, but of course, one cannot be too careful. Clubs and Activities circle k etc. Great for these types of students -plan to transfer -that don't mind going to a small school before university Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus on a warm day, I like to sit outside the cafeteria under all the trees, on a relatively windy day, it's really comfortable and a lot more quiet tan inside the cafeteria. Bang for the buck it's pretty good. I like the campus, and some of my teachers are really good. What to do for fun if you're in a music class, you will have access to the practice rooms that are sound proof and have pianos... everything else depends on your creativity or resourcefulness for finding fun things to do. Food and Dining prefetch decent food, a litte pricey in my opinion, but the portions are good. Dorm
